metadata.title: CVE-2023-28849 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a free asset and IT management software package. Starting inversion 10.0.0 and prior to version 10.0.7, GLPI inventory endpoint can beused to drive a SQL injection attack. It can also be used to storemalicious code that could be used to perform XSS attack. By default, GLPIinventory endpoint requires no authentication. Version 10.0.7 contains apatch for this issue. As a workaround, disable native inventory.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
